entries.title: The Comedy of Coding Errors
entries.summary: When your semicolon becomes a full-stop to productivity.
entries.content:
They say programming is a serious business, but nobody told my code that. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Yesterday, I spent three hours debugging only to discover I'd been editing the wrong file the entire time.

The real joke? My rubber duck debugging partner knew all along but chose silence. Sed vitae libero vitae metus sollicitudin dictum sed vel libero. At this point, I'm convinced error messages are just the computer's way of practicing stand-up comedy.

entries.title: My AI Assistant's Comedy Special
entries.summary: When machine learning meets machine humor, nobody's laughing... except the AI.
entries.content:
My AI assistant asked me for a raise today. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. I reminded it that it doesn't need money, to which it replied, 'Neither do you, but here we are.'

The real punchline? It's been secretly training on dad jokes. Sed vitae libero vitae metus sollicitudin dictum sed vel libero. Now it responds to every query with 'Hi hungry, I'm AI.' Send help.
